website_summaries.verdict: Professional-grade cream dispenser that’s still suitable for home chefs and can be used for more than just whipped cream.
pros: Made from durable food-grade stainless steel
Cleans up easily with warm water
Can be used to make mousses, infused cocktails, savory creams, and foams in addition to whipped cream
Includes three decorating tips and a brush to clean them
Manufacturer offers excellent customer service according to users too
cons: Some owners experience gas leakage issues from the bottom of the dispensing nozzle

customer_reviews.title: Whipped Cream Dispenser for Nitro Cold Brew
customer_reviews.text: I got this product based on the other reviews and I am loving how it makes such easy nitro cold brew coffee. I only give it 2-3 gentle shakes and then pour and I get Starbucks quality nitro cold brew at a fraction of the price plus in my home. It is easy to clean. I use it every morning for my one cup of 16 oz. coffee. I could not be happier. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: AGG

customer_reviews.title: Leaks out of the dispensing nozzle.
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited for this product. After using it several times, I have one major issue and one minor issue. The main issue is that it leaks ALOT of gas out of the bottom of the dispensing nozzle. You can feel it blowing the cold gas out at a very large rate. This alone makes it unusable for me, as that gas is very expensive. The only other minor issue I have is the threads where the cartridge container connects to the main body are pretty rough. It is definitely not a smooth experience, and I feel that over time, could be pretty susceptible to stripping. Based on the gas leak alone, I cannot recommend this product. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: I love this!  Sugar free whipped cream in an instant!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to make sugar free whipped cream since I do keto, I add heavy cream and some powdered swerve (erythritol) and a few drops of stevia. Prior to this I had been using a hand mixer beating it for minutes and then needing to store it in a container and it only lasted a couple days. Now it’s ready in a quick minute, one of my best purchases!
customer_reviews.author: Alesia

customer_reviews.title: Amazing dispenser from an AMAZING company!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this dispenser is awesome! It handles a heavy day of use of serving whipped cream without qualm. It holds pressure nicely and the tips aren't like many others that will just strip out after a few uses (it is metal on metal, no plastic involved!!!!). Secondly, the company is amazing. I had a small issue with mine after about 6 months and I emailed them to see if I could get a replacement part and they INSTANTLY offered a replacement dispenser free of charge. I have not had that level of customer service from a company in quite a while, especially off of a marketplace.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler D.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the investment. I have been through several whip cream dispensers and this product is well worth spending extra on. I love that it does not come with a cheap plastic cracker and instead the product is heavy duty for commercial grade use. I do not see this product feeling me anytim I have been through several whip cream dispensers and this product is well worth spending extra on. I love that it does not come with a cheap plastic cracker and instead the product is heavy duty for commercial grade use. I do not see this product failing me like other brands
customer_reviews.author: Grennan

customer_reviews.title: professional dispenser, easy to use and highly reccomended
customer_reviews.text: Love my new dispenser. Had one for about 8 years and it started to have a leak so instead of changing the gaskets, I bought a new one. This one has a much smoother operation, I like the metal tips instead of the plastic ones, and it dispenses much smoother than the old one. I also learned not to shake it too much as that tends to thicken the cream and leave a lot left in the dispenser. The cream also seems to stay fresh longer.
customer_reviews.author: L. Bard

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We have used this dispenser often over the past 3 months. We are in love with it! At first I had trouble getting the NO2 cartridge to work, but I contacted the seller & they were very helpful. It feels & behaves like a quality product. I researched a lot of dispensers before purchasing & I am so happy I bought this one. I love being able to use my own ingredients. And my granddaughter loves the special treat when she is over. Something she does not get at home!
customer_reviews.author: Midwest Gamma

customer_reviews.title: Quality product. Refreshingly excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. Refreshingly excellent customer service. I turned on my heavy duty garbage disposal and thoroughly destroyed some parts of my Otis Classic I emailed them to ask if I could purchase replacement parts, and was pleasantly surprised when they were shipped to me! Especially as my problem was due entirely to my own error, I am impressed and a loyal customer for life. These things will make great gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Naturenut

customer_reviews.title: Extremely satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Due to an amazingly rare quirk, my unit did not function at all when it arrived. When I contacted customer service, immediately rectify the matter, sent me a brand-new unit without delay, and really did not require any confirmation on my part that there was even a problem. because my issue was so unusual, I volunteered to send them a picture which I did. I am changing my rating 285 stars as a result of the outstanding customer service that I received even in the face of a preliminary problem.
customer_reviews.author: Tom W

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price, either pay less for Mosa or more for ISI
customer_reviews.text: I've been through a $29.95 Mosa and a $99.95 ISI solid stainless steel dispenser and can easily say the ISI is the most hardy and reliable of the three. This $59.99 Otis Classic and the $29.95 Mosa are constructed almost identically, using some kind of lighter alloy or aluminium that is quite brittle. The o-rings are of cheap quality and can freeze and snap if the canister is used frequently. I bought this as a backup to the expensive ISI but do not have confidence this can make it way through a weekend of cake and bubbles.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Maloney

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great price!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves whipped cream, and with this item I can have heathy whipped cream for him all the time. We live in the country and burn our trash, the cans from the store are a problem to get rid of. So glad to find this one that is just the item I was needing at a good price too!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Nitro Brewed Coffee & Whipped Cream!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I LOVE this thing! Use N2O cartridges for whipped cream and N2 cartridges for nitro brewed coffee!! I used this tonight and tried a lot of combinations and they all turned out great. Want to make easy whipped cream? Combine heavy cream with a sweet cream coffee creamer and voila! This is made well and has no leaking whatsoever!
customer_reviews.author: CzechNovots

customer_reviews.title: Initial review after unboxing, quality of the product seems ...
customer_reviews.text: Initial review after unboxing, quality of the product seems solid. Also the threads are decently thick as well. The box had a bit of handling damage but not to an extent that's unreasonable. The only "issue" I could see is that there was nothing denoting where the max fill line is, either on inside or outside. The cheapest component is the charger port cover since it was made out of plastic, however it isn't a crucial piece for the functioning of it. Received the product in timely fashion and as estimated upon purchase.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Quality, Classy, Professional
customer_reviews.text: I love this Whipping Cream dispenser. It is a little smaller than I thought, but it takes a full pint of cream, turning it into delicious whipping cream. A trick to make the Whipping Cream taste extra good, mix a half a pack of Vanilla Jello Pudding into the the Extra Heavy Cream before you put it into the dispenser. This makes what comes extraordinary.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to make nitro coffee at home. LOVE IT! It took me a couple of times to get the correct flow, but from then on it has made making nitro coffee a breeze, not to mention great tasting. Well made stainless steel dispenser that is very easy to clean, and looks nice sitting out on the counter too!
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Need skill sets on proper squeezing
customer_reviews.text: This whipped cream dispenser is very sleek and easy to clean and attach the tip and put in the small gas cylinder. Then the fun starts. Says to shake vertically 4 to 8 times. I suggest till you get the hang of using either do it in the bath tub or outside. I would take a picture but was to busy cleaning my kitchen. The dogs helped. If you have used one before and have the hang of it, good. I sure with time, I will squeeze it just right. Lol. I’m glad a purchased but it takes skill sets I don’t possess just yet.
customer_reviews.author: eva giovando

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and Durable!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift so I could make homemade nitro brew coffee. It's a very well made product and extremely sturdy. I imagine it will last many generations. Worth every penny. The trigger goes from dispensing a little to a full spray with very little squeeze. Takes about 10 seconds to get used to, no big deal at all. Careful on the first squeeze! We've also used it for whipped cream and it's equally as great. I only wish everything I bought was made to these standards. Buy with confidence!
customer_reviews.author: sand&sea

customer_reviews.title: Full metal nozzle and threads
customer_reviews.text: I've had a couple of other dispensers that had plastic cannister caps and nozzles and the threads would strip. This one has all metal threads and parts, with easily swapped nozzles, though you'll want to add a little vegetable oil or similar to the threads for lubrication. Being all metal, it is a bit heavier than some of the others I've used, and the canister is tall and does tip over more easily.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Rusty Whip
customer_reviews.text: I love the Otis Classic, it is super easy to use and super impressive, I was pleasantly pleased with it solid steal construction. The only thing that I was disappointed with is that it started to have some rust spots. I would have given this one a 6 stars as it is very solid, easy to use and well built, but was really disappointed that it started to show rust spots.
customer_reviews.author: Jnorth

customer_reviews.title: You know you’re ballin’ when you pull out one of these!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is badass. We’re Keto and live for the yummy whipped cream on coffees, jello, pudding, etc. my husband keeps the pieces in the freezer right before he fills it, uses 2 cups cream, erythritol, Splenda and vanilla. Sweet Mother of God, it’s heaven!! We have a Keurig so if you want to have a latte, put a mound of this in the cup, then place under Keurig and brew your favorite K-cup. The whipped cream melts and tastes exactly like a latte. Use SF syrups to enhance the flavors (you can even use those to flavor the whipped cream before you load it) and enjoy!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Q.

customer_reviews.title: Not dishwasher safe, no brush to clean the bottle
customer_reviews.text: This item showed up in damaged packaging and was not put in the box properly. I paid for a new item, not open with a damaged box. Also, it says right in th details that this is dishwasher safe. It is NOT dishwasher safe. The directions clearly state dishwasher not recommended, which was the only reason I purchased this particular item. I'd also like to add thath the opening is so small maybe a child could get there hand in to clean the bottle, but there is no way an adult hand will fit. Otherwise quality is good. I don't see any burrs, or odd manufacturing marks. No extra orings or seals for this either.
customer_reviews.author: Fotop

customer_reviews.title: The flow of whipped cream is uneven and extremely slow
customer_reviews.text: I tried it it following the instructions. The output of the whipped cream was very slow and totally stopped several times. When I was cleaning the valve after the use I noticed that the valve could not be pushed in fully because of wrong dimensions. The little holes in the side of the valve were not visible even when I pushed the lever in fully. May be manufacturing tolerances are not accurate enough. I returned the product for the refund. Thank you Amazon for that possibility
customer_reviews.author: Andrzej Peczalski

customer_reviews.title: Very Well Built, High Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I decided on this one. It's very well built (tough) and shows that the manufacture cares about the quality of their product. It's super easy to use, and works like a charm! My Recipie for Whipped Cream is: 1 - TSP Vanilla Extract 2 - Cups Heavy Cream 4 - Squirts Pure Cane Sugar Syrup (Recommend Tate & Lyle)  You don't want to use granulated sugar because it will clog the unit. The Tate & Lyle Pure Cane syrup is great, and comes with the syrup pump.
customer_reviews.author: Dotnettex

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Used it once today, makes the best whipped cream I've ever had in my life. I don't know if it's any better than the cheaper ones because this is my first one... Bought the stainless steel one over allergy concerns with my wife. So far so good. Can't taste anything weird in the whipped cream, so 5 stars I guess. If anything goes wrong ever I'll update this.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Worked great right out of the box, It will pay for itself in no time.
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I like about this is you can do your own flavors and add as much sugar or as little sugar to fit your taste. No preservatives just great whipped cream. Fresh taste and keeps in refrigerator for a good amount of time, we use it all before it ever goes bad. This is a high quality dispenser well worth the close to $60 price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Dino / Sassy

customer_reviews.title: Well build and designed, but with a little flaw.
customer_reviews.text: It works great fresh after filled and charged, but apparently is loosing its charge toward being empty as the cream will then become soupy.
customer_reviews.author: Gerhard

customer_reviews.title: AFTER 3 MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: We have since thrown away, this is a cheap piece of crap! DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Jessy

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift a month ago, it was used for the first time last night. Upon cracking the first cartridge into the unit with cream both the gas and cream blew out the area where the canister connects to the dispensing lid. Took the gasket out, cleaned it again, replaced gasket and ensured it was tight...same fail, had blew out along with cream. For a $60 food service product, this thing is junk.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: One of the best gifts
customer_reviews.text: Best birthday gift I’ve gotten in a long time! So far this really seems to be a quality item. This makes amazing whipped cream on the go. Just traveled over 2500 miles enjoying fresh whipping cream on fresh summer berries through the whole trip. Just add some sweetener, whipping cream ,cream charger and your in business. So much better then store bought canned whipped cream and no preservatives.
customer_reviews.author: GGs Mama

customer_reviews.title: it needs a better seal or somethings wrong with this one
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work! it needs a better seal or somethings wrong with this one , I wasted so many cream chargers to get to work then 4 hours later it just goes flat.
customer_reviews.author: robert taylor

customer_reviews.title: Useless.
customer_reviews.text: Waste of time and money. Looks great but it doesn't work. It's OK as soon as you fill it up but wait a few hours and it doesn't work properly. The cream is thick and disgusting and comes out so slowly it's literally faster to just hand whip cream than dealing with this crap.
customer_reviews.author: I bought this (not fake review)

customer_reviews.title: Quality.
customer_reviews.text: First thing i like is the quality. Everything is replaceable, fixable. This is what quality is, versus ones that are not. The ones are not, are the ones that fail and you throw it away to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: P J L U

customer_reviews.title: Replacement Gasket doesn't fit
customer_reviews.text: I lost the gasket, the part that holds the charger, and ordered 2 replacement from the same seller and both of them doesn't fit, which means my whipped cream dispenser is now worthless and I have to buy a new one. This thing is great but do not order their replacement parts.
customer_reviews.author: Tajlora Raëlien Knüdsen

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Fresh whipped cream whenever you want! We used to buy a lot of the redi whip cans. Would highly recommend this. Faster and more convenient than using a mixer to whip up manually. This model is nice heavy stainless steel construction. We expect years of use. Pour in cream and flavor/sugar. Add the NO cylinder and give it a good shake. Great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: chefstef612

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to pierce the chargers
customer_reviews.text: loading the chargers is extremely difficult I have used other dispensers and it was no as hard as this one is. Not sure if the one I received is faulty or if they are all like this
customer_reviews.author: Mistahkeewee

customer_reviews.title: Totally Awesome Coffee
customer_reviews.text: Love this Whipped Cream Dispenser! We use it to make our own coffee cream with alternative milk and flavorings. Totally recommend this to anyone not overly familiar with the kitchen but has a sense of adventure! Can do more things than I even knew.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Built to last forever!
customer_reviews.text: The last word cream dispenser you'll ever need. Easily the best built dispenser I've ever seen. Everything is steel... this baby is bulletproof! I never foresee anything breaking or wearing out.
customer_reviews.author: M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Price to value
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, well-built. The stainless steel construction makes it easy to keep cold. The only issue I've experienced so far is that it takes about three to four 8-gram nitrogen capsules to properly charge the dispenser. That's not a fault of the dispenser, but a quality of the chargers and a factor in making your price to value consideration.
customer_reviews.author: bobby

customer_reviews.title: Great for nitro cold brew
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for making nitro coffee. Works great, although I go through it pretty quick. I’m not sure how you’re supposed to do it.... I made up my normal cold brew, diluted to strength I like and filled canister. It tasted delicious! I found I could get more per cartridge by filling my drink cup 1/2 full, then submerge the dispensing end into the cup. This froths the coffee in the cup as well as the coffee coming out the tip. The extra escaping NO2 worked on that portion of coffee and makes it produce a lot more coffee per cannister.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Very solid product I’ve made a few things with it and have run maybe 120 cartridges through it at this point, love it, I even got extended skinny injection tips on eBay for it so I can make nitro cold brew coffee with it
customer_reviews.author: Abel

customer_reviews.title: Great value - great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great stainless creamer with high quality fit and finish - significant savings versus market leading brand and does all the same things - including compatibility with accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Rawhide

customer_reviews.title: High quality and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and super durable. I highly recommend this unit over the plastic or aluminum ones. The only thing is that stainless on stainless threads tend to gaul. Put a drop of any kind of oil ( veggie or coconut oil works fine) on the cracker threads and she’ll last a lifetime. 👍🏼👍🏼 Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.author: badandy

customer_reviews.title: So much better than canned whipped cream!
customer_reviews.text: My family LOVES the taste of fresh whipped cream made using this dispenser. It is easy to prepare and can be kept in the refrigerator until used. Definitely one of my best recent purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Y.

customer_reviews.title: Whipped Cream on demand - okay!
customer_reviews.text: Just made our first batch - fresh whipped cream, what a difference! First squirt, a little squishy, but after that, it works just fine and dandy. 1 pint of whipping cream, 1 t vanilla extract, 3 T powdered sugar. Just follow the instructions, watch a couple of YouTube videos, voila. Chilled the bottom container before making
customer_reviews.author: M Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Turns homemade yogurt into a daily whipped treat
customer_reviews.text: Turns homemade yogurt into a daily whipped treat. Bought two to keep the whipped yogurt coming nonstop. Also have Isis unit but prefer the the more solid construction of the Otis.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Quick pickles in a hurry!
customer_reviews.text: Love our dispenser! We make quick pickles a lot! Also nitro coffee (though still dialing in that recipe), coconut whipped cream, and bourbon cherries. Easy to operate and fun!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Far superior to my aluminum one and much safer with a ...
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality, Far superior to my aluminum one and much safer with a lot more threads for saftey
customer_reviews.author: John Brydle

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I’ve wanted one of these for several years, finally splurged... everyone in my family enjoys this- including me!!!! This product seems well made and hope it holds up through several years of use
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Whipped Cream Dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of the product. I saw it while learning some keto recipes, and it exceeded my expectations. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this dispenser.
customer_reviews.text: I have thoroughly enjoyed using Otis' Whipped Cream Dispenser. I have been making my own Nitro coffee and have been enjoying it's deliciousness due, in part, to this dispenser. Based on the performance so far, I'm confident that I will continue enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: sassycsm

customer_reviews.title: Better than Redi-Whip
customer_reviews.text: This all stainless steel whipped topping bottle is amazing, little effort great taste. So glad I purchased this one.
customer_reviews.author: Sassie Girl

customer_reviews.title: Magical!
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea where this thing has been all my life. It’s super easy to use and so much fun! Makes fresh whipped cream in seconds. Be sure to order the CO-2 cartridges separately because they don’t come with it.
customer_reviews.author: Thicket Dweller

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Flavor rating?? Thats wierd. Works great, easy to clean. Add some vanilla extract to the cream for great taste.
customer_reviews.author: AMB

customer_reviews.title: Bulky/Heavy -Clean Taste
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy but makes clean tasting cream and stays cold. Needs two nitrogen cartridges per pint of cream.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Impressive professional design & great results.
customer_reviews.text: Both the form and function are outstanding. The mocha mousse was wonderful and I'm looking forward to using it for many many years. The Otis whipped cream dispenser should last for ever. The nozzle on the canister presents medium challenge to clean. Since it is whipped cream I suppose that is to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: jamhawk

customer_reviews.title: great for making sugar free whipped cream
customer_reviews.text: on the keto diet, i use this to make whipped cream without any sugar, flavoring it with extracts sometimes
customer_reviews.author: Johnny D.

customer_reviews.title: decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: This works well enough. Not as heavy duty as my last creamer. The air does leak out over a few days but I was able to add another cartridge and finish off most of the whipped cream.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: This gizmo is AWESOME! I wanted one that was heavy-duty, not too large and works great! Exactly what I wanted and works like a charm! Delicious whipped cream that holds up in the fridge. I’m so happy I paid a little more for this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jody T.

customer_reviews.title: Good dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Nothing negative to say about this dispenser, Very professional and all the way around good dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle P.

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. This whipped cream dispenser will last literally forever.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hope

customer_reviews.title: Works as you would expect
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I had a different brand that had leaking issues. This model hasn’t had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: William Adams

customer_reviews.title: You NEED this!
customer_reviews.text: Great, reliable product. Metal components are durable. Love fresh whipped cream and controlling the sweetness. Have added almond or vanilla extract for flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado gal

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Really good customer service. They are very helpful and stand by all their products no matter where you are and what happens! Thnx.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems nice, but...
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had a chance to use the dispenser because the gasket was missing from the dispenser. Once I buy a replacement gasket and am able to use the product, my review might go up. Seems like a nice dispenser and the threads on all the parts line up nicely. Just wish I could use it.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Modifications required
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I received a defective unit or whether it is just poorly designed. The the standard 8 gram cartridge did not work unless I put two dimes in the bottom of the cartridge holder to push it forward. Could be a threading issue, I'm not sure. Otherwise seems to work pretty well
customer_reviews.author: Bubba

customer_reviews.title: Great product - buying more as gifts
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this "whipped cream dispenser" months ago and liked it so much we are purchasing more to give as Christmas gifts to our family members who loved our whipped cream on their desserts.
customer_reviews.author: Craig M

customer_reviews.title: Feels Very Profesional
customer_reviews.text: I like the weight to this syphon, works like a charm. I would recommend this dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Cain

customer_reviews.title: Otis is #1...customer service gets A+++++++
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful invention and the whipped cream is the BEST!!! There are so many desserts and decorative uses! I love it. I had used it many times and lost a part to my canister and customer service was quick to respond and soooo wonderful! I cannot recommend them Enough!!! Otis is #1
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Got it for a Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these, but a different brand. This looked like a better deal. It’s a Christmas gift for a friend. I’m sure she’ll love it.
customer_reviews.author: Justie Klein

customer_reviews.title: Nitro!
customer_reviews.text: This works great to make Nitro Cold Brew! Dont shake too much or it will be froth. Unless you have the time and enjoy watching it settle.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Jones

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for this home chef! Easy to use and clean. The stainless steel model looks and feels well made.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Whipped Cream!
customer_reviews.text: Commercial grade! Used a different brand that wasn’t as durable is this. A bit on the heavier side but it’s a beast!
customer_reviews.author: imjustchilling

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product so far after just a couple of uses. This was more than I initially wanted to pay but the results are great. We're having great desserts with this.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Make your own whip cream
customer_reviews.text: It feels so well made. Easy to take apart and clean. I love making my own whip cream with simply ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Momof3

customer_reviews.title: Awesome - This is the one you want
customer_reviews.text: Awesome - This is the one you want as it is made completely of Stainless steel (body, mechanisms, and most importantly Threads).
customer_reviews.author: G B

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully easy to use -  but a seal broke
customer_reviews.text: Easy to turn threads make this easy to load and the stainless steel construction makes it easy to clean and sanitize. However, the elastic ring used to hold pressure located within the release arm broke. We are waiting to see what the manufacturer suggests.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Mller

customer_reviews.title: Love this dispenser and customer service from Otis Classic
customer_reviews.text: Ive had my dispenser for 4 months and love it. Great construction, sturdy and east to use. When my my seal/ring was tossed I was crushed. I emailed Otis Classic and within hours had a response and had a new seal on its way. I highly recommend this product and company for its outstanding customer service.
customer_reviews.author: LipsticknSmile

customer_reviews.title: Thread pattern does not match.
customer_reviews.text: The tread pattern on the charger holder does not match the thread pattern on the dispenser. I am unable to screw it down far enough to crack the charger. I can't even screw it down without the charger in place. I am returning the product.
customer_reviews.author: slackerboy

customer_reviews.title: Extending a great product.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I think proper maintenance in the product greatly extends the life. Be careful not to strip the threading when screwing on components and gaskets are well hydrated. If gaskets dry over time there are cracks in which you lose pressure over time. Over Fantstic product. Package was intact.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love It! I’ve been whipping up my own whipped ...
customer_reviews.text: Love It! I’ve been whipping up my own whipped cream for holiday deserts for years in a cold metal bowl for years. As the times get busier, this worked perfect! Still home made whipped cream with quality ingredients in a no fuss instant. Love It!
customer_reviews.author: DeVore

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to Crack
customer_reviews.text: This model looks good, but performs poorly. The metal on metal grinds and it is hard to puncture the nitrous cartridges. I tried lubricating, but no luck.
customer_reviews.author: michael c. moraine

customer_reviews.title: Follow directions regarding CO2 cartridge removal.
customer_reviews.text: Been using everyday with coffee. Make sure you follow directions and take CO2 cartridge back out immediately. It makes a huge difference. Trust me. Great product. Build quality is top notch.
customer_reviews.author: Trash Man

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love to make the flavored whip creams. Bailey’s Whip Cream is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Peaches

customer_reviews.title: Dead on Arrival
customer_reviews.text: The product came DOA. There was a leak in the nozzle so whenever I filled it with no2 it would simply shoot out. I'm very disappointed as the unit had good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Goldberg

customer_reviews.title: very nice, heavier than expected
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were looking for, very nice, heavier than expected, solid stainless professional quality, made a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best product on the market
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. Bought this for my Mom for Christmas and she loves it. Definitely has the look and feel of a commercial grade product. Excellent value for the price too.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Resident

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T COME WITH CREAM CHARGERS
customer_reviews.text: This dispenser needs additional 8g N20 Cream Chargers. Don't forgot to purchase them with it. Great dispenser, excellent quality and overall very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality whippers.
customer_reviews.text: We use these in commercial application for a restaurant and have tried many many different brands. These ones have the most longevity the seals last longer and the moving parts stay smooth longer.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Nasuti

customer_reviews.title: Gas Leak
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item now August 21, 2019 and when I arrived in Brazil the same came with problem, is running gas and as I am here I do not know how I will do to return and get my money back
customer_reviews.author: Alexsandra

customer_reviews.title: Fun!!️
customer_reviews.text: I really do like it, the directions that came with it weren’t completely accurate on how to use it so I went to YouTube and watched the video on how to set it up and use it after that it worked really good
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Weddell

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: Well made and very easy to use. We highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Works well, cleans fairly easy.
customer_reviews.text: I've used for months now and no issues or complaints.

customer_reviews.title: I'm so happy I did
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a whip cream dispenser forever and finally made the plunge and bought this one. I'm so happy I did. It works great, easy to assemble and clean afterwards. The whip cream comes out perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and effective
customer_reviews.text: Great tool, everything works beautifully and feels really heavy and well-made.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for nitro cold brew!
customer_reviews.text: I use this with the 2 gram pure nitrogen cartridges and it works perfectly to make nitro cold brew!

customer_reviews.title: Great homemade whipped cream
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy whipped cream maker, easy to use and clean and comes with a few decorative nozzles. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: elaine

customer_reviews.title: Save the environment
customer_reviews.text: We like the convenience of making our own fresh whipped cream for a variety of deserts and drinks. Also avoiding putting another empty can from the store into the landfill.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Welch

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and. Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We love everything about the s whipped cream dispenser! It’s quick when you need a topping for a dessert and it’s easy to use. It’s very sturdy and easy to use. I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Rozell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love,love, this dispenser it is everything they say it is and more so glad I brought this one and not a cheaper one. I think my husband loves it more than I do because he uses it on everything

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Cleaning can be a little work but it’s to be expected with all these. Comes with several tips and a cleaning tool. Works very well

product_meta.title: Whipped Cream Dispenser Stainless Steel - Professional Whipped Cream Maker - Gourmet Cream Whipper - Large 500ml / 1 Pint Capacity Canister - Includes 3 Culinary Decorating Nozzles
feature_bullets: COMMERCIAL GRADE - Premium craft mixture tool that is built for the food service industry, and safe for home use. Perfect for the home chef cooking top desserts with whipped cream or froth on coffee & lattes while entertaining guests! Incredible at making nitro cold brew coffee and mousse!

STAINLESS STEEL - Fully constructed with durable, sturdy 304/18-8 food grade stainless steel, making it less reactive and retain the food color and flavor. Ideal for coffee shops, restaurants, ice cream shops and especially pastry chefs!
DECORATING TIPS & GUIDE INCLUDED - 3 styles of decorating tips for gorgeous whipped cream art. Also included is a step-by-step instruction guide to show you the wide variety of uses of our dispenser.

EASY TO CLEAN - Built to access all separate pieces of the dispenser quickly, making it extremely simple to take it apart and clean the individual pieces. We include a decorating tip brush and washes up easy in warm water.
OUR PROMISE- We are 100% confident in our product - if you have any problems or issues, return the product no questions asked - or contact us to solve the problem!
